name: Rock-Paper-Scissors Game
responsibilities: Keep track of both player's score
Determine which player is the winner of each round/draw
Keep running until program is closed
Remember how many times each player won/how many draws

name: Round
responsibilities: Determine which player wins the round/draw
Keep running until window is closed

name: Game Rules
responsibilities: Calculate win/draw based on rules: Rock beats Scissors, Scissors beats Paper, Paper beats Rock. If both players select the same then draw

name: Players
responsibilities: Allow each player to pick Rock, Paper or Scissors
Keep track of each player's score
Keep track of number of draws
